data.event: Polk County was formed on January 13, 1846.
The first courthouse, a two-story structure, was built in 1846.
Construction of a second courthouse was begun in 1858.
Due to construction delays and the onset of the Civil War, the structure was not completed until 1866.
The present courthouse was erected in 1906 in the Beaux Arts style.
In 1962, an extensive renovation was undertaken.
